pages.text: $(italic)At the latest when you held a wet sponge in your hands, you thought that there must be a counterpart for lava. Even though you haven't stumbled across one yet, that hasn't stopped you from inventing one, of course. This altered sponge absorbs a lot of the infernal fluid you found in the depths of the earth and beyond the portal to hell. This should make navigation there much easier...

... or so you thought, until you realized that the lava-soaked sponge also has an unfortunate side effect. You should have guessed.$(br2)The Lava Sponge can be used as highly efficient fuel in the furnace, at the same time drying it.
